      • addMainCategory

        public String addMainCategory(String category,
                              String propertyname)
                       throws ClassNotFoundException,
                              SQLException,
                              IOException,
                              IOException
        Is used for when we want to add a Main Category to the DB via the JSP page. We first call a different method to check whether the new category already exists or not via the category name and then either add it to the DB and sends back a confirmation response or we don't add it and sends back a confirmation response.
        Specified by:
        addMainCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        category - - Takes a string of a main category name.
        Returns:
        - Returns a string of whether or not the given category name has been successfully added to the db.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • editMainCategory

        public void editMainCategory(int categoryInt,
                             String categoryStr,
                             String propertyname)
                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                             SQLException,
                             IOException
        Is used for when we want to edit an existing Main Category from the DB via the JSP page. We take the ID of the selected category and the new name input of the new category and apply it to the DB via executeUpdate().
        Specified by:
        editMainCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        categoryInt - - Takes the ID of the selected main category from the JSP page.
        categoryStr - - Takes the new name input written by the user from the JSP page.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • getMinorValuesFromDBFile

        public int getMinorValuesFromDBFile(String minorname,
                                    String propertyname)
                             throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                    SQLException,
                                    IOException
        Used for checking if a minor value already exists in the db. If it doesn't exist the value 0 will be given back and the upload knows it has to create the category.
        Specified by:
        getMinorValuesFromDBFile in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        minorname - - category minorname
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns the ID of the matching name
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • createMainIDInDB

        public int createMainIDInDB(String mainname,
                            String propertyname)
                     throws ClassNotFoundException,
                            SQLException,
                            IOException
        When adding a product we must know if the category has to be created what mainid the product should have. This method is used for getting the count of all maincategories and once it gets the return value it knows what is next.
        Specified by:
        createMainIDInDB in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        mainname - - category mainname
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns the ID value of the newly created category.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • checkOrCreateLinkminormain

        public void checkOrCreateLinkminormain(int mainid,
                                       int minorid,
                                       String propertyname)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                       SQLException,
                                       IOException
        Checked if a link has been created between a minor and main category. If a link doesn't already exists a link is created in DB.
        Specified by:
        checkOrCreateLinkminormain in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        mainid - - category mainid
        minorid - - category minorid
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Throws:

        SQLException
        IOException

      • deleteMainCategory

        public void deleteMainCategory(int category,
                               String propertyname)
                        throws ClassNotFoundException,
                               SQLException,
                               IOException
        Is used for when we want to delete an existing Main Category from the DB via the JSP page. We first update every product's published status to 'unpublished' and their main category field to NULL which has the related category in question. First then do we delete the link between the main category and its minor category and finally delete the main category itself via its ID.
        Specified by:
        deleteMainCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        category - - Takes an integer of ID of a selected main category name.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • deleteMinorCategory

        public void deleteMinorCategory(int category,
                                String propertyname)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                SQLException,
                                IOException
        Is used for when we want to delete an existing Minor Category from the DB via the JSP page. We first update every product's published status to 'unpublished' and their minor category field, which has the related category in question, to NULL. First then do we delete the link between the minor category and its main category and finally delete the minor category itself via its ID.
        Specified by:
        deleteMinorCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        category - - Takes an integer of ID of a selected main category name.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • checkMainCategory

        public Boolean checkMainCategory(String category,
                                 String propertyname)
                          throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                 SQLException,
                                 IOException
        Is used for when we want to check whether a Main Category already exists in the DB or not.
        Specified by:
        checkMainCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        category - - Takes an integer of ID of a selected main category name.
        Returns:
        - Returns a boolean of either false or true depending on whether we already have a main category in the DB with the same name as the given 'String category'.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • chartMinorCategory

        public String chartMinorCategory(String propertyname)
                          throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                 SQLException,
                                 IOException
        Used for displaying a count of different minor categories with count on the chart on the index frontpage. We get the info and read them into a gsonObj.toJson as this is how or charts work.
        Specified by:
        chartMinorCategory in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns gsonObj.toJson as this is needed for the chart to display the information.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        SQLException
        IOException

                   throws ClassNotFoundException,
                          SQLException,
                          IOException
        Used for chartMinorCategory to get a count of a category name.
        Specified by:
        getMinorAmount in interface CategoryMapperInterface
        Parameters:
        propertyname - - for db connection
        Returns:
        returns an int value of the ammount of minor categories that is above 0.
